title: ‘Absolutely BRUTAL’: Robin Pogrebin and Kate Kelly are completely unprepared for Saagar Enjeti’s ‘actual journalism’ [video]
text:
As Twitchy told you earlier, Hill TV’s Saagar Enjeti and Krystal Ball interviewed anti-Kavanaugh smear merchants Robin Pogrebin and Kate Kelly, forcing them into a corner where they effectively shot down their narrative that Brett Kavanaugh had asked them to lie about talking with him in exchange for an interview. But that wasn’t the only narrative that fell apart.

You seriously need to watch the whole thing:

Kavanaugh authors stopped by to talk about their book. I asked them why they appeared to blaming Fox News for their errors, why they didn't include Max Steier's democratic work history in their book, and more on Leland Keyser. You can watch it here: https://t.co/a7gCA2eHoQ — Saagar Enjeti (@esaagar) September 19, 2019

How do Pogrebin and Kelly still have careers?

The best part is when Saagar asks them why she blamed Fox News and she said she didn't she just retweeted an article "for balance". The Vox article's main complaint is the use of "correction" instead of "editor's note". She then went right on to say they "corrected" the article. — John Ekdahl (@JohnEkdahl) September 19, 2019

In this interview one of the authors of the Kavanaugh book, Robin Pogrebin, describes what the New York Times did as a "correction" when they added an editor's note She previously tweeted a Vox story accusing Fox news of twisting the NYT note as a "correction" when it wasn't https://t.co/gpTyaGZq8x — Tim Pool (@Timcast) September 19, 2019

Reminder:

How Fox News twisted the Kavanaugh scandal into a way to attack the New York Times @atrupar https://t.co/hZGKUXR1jZ via @voxdotcom — Robin Pogrebin (@rpogrebin) September 18, 2019

These women are a disaster.

Just appalling! — April (@aprilmay1721) September 19, 2019

Despicable can’t even get started as a word to describe these two. It’s sickening to my gut! — Chelly Longoria (@ChellyLongoria) September 19, 2019

Women continue to poop at work. https://t.co/HcdbZRrvdG — Varad Mehta (@varadmehta) September 19, 2019

Heh.

Proof positive that someone out there had a worse day than Justin Trudeau. https://t.co/kg5UCU0Mgu — John Hayward (@Doc_0) September 19, 2019

And something tells us they haven’t bottomed out quite yet.

Meanwhile, kudos to Enjeti for demonstrating how journalism is supposed to be done.

Wow, you were fantastic. Great interview. — CircusPony (@CircusPony14) September 19, 2019

Thanks for doing some actual journalism!!! — colin moon (@cmooney1923) September 19, 2019

Great Job. Thank you for asking them the questions that other friendlier new outlets would not. Much appreciated. — Richard Yastrab (@RYastrab) September 19, 2019

Kudos to Saagar for pressing these two. Absolutely BRUTAL interview for them. https://t.co/YyyJHpouZp — John Ekdahl (@JohnEkdahl) September 19, 2019
